alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Box Elder County through 445 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, or 39 miles south of Snowville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Curlew Junction, Locomotive Springs, Rosette and Gunnison Island. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 2. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 51 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
